title: Avoiding Financial Abuse (with Suze Orman)
description:
Guest Suze Orman discusses money’s role in both personal and professional abusive relationships. Plus, follow-ups from last month’s shows.


Financial abuse websites mentioned in this episode:

PurplePurse.com

TheHotline.org (800-799-7233)


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
